itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson is drunk and snowed in at his house in Texas raging on the Democrats losing two impeachment trials against President Donald Trump, why Texans are pu$$ies when it comes to snow, local news anchor Terri Gruca trying to create racism during power outages, why 'The Bachelor' lost it's host, and CNN deciding to cover Joe Biden's sleep schedule instead of talking about Andrew Cuomo covering up the amount of old people he has killed in the state of New York since the pandemic hit.
